data.name: Bassmaster® Fishing 2022: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
data.detailed_description:
Stand out from the crowd with the Deluxe Upgrade content such as the unique Bassmaster® Fishing 2022 boat wrap, B.A.S.S.® branded cosmetics and equipment, and your own list of in-game Deluxe Edition challenges, so you can become the ultimate Bassmaster angler.

Deluxe Upgrade Pack content:
• Blazer Boat equipped with a powerful 250HP Mercury Engine
• Bassmaster Fishing 2022 Exclusive Boat Wrap
• Unique in-game Deluxe Edition Challenges with special rewards to Deluxe Edition anglers
• Bass-Nation Tournament Jersey
• Selection of B.A.S.S. Clothing
• B.A.S.S. Casting Rod & Reel
• B.A.S.S. Spinning Rod & Reel
• B.A.S.S. branded lures

data.short_description: Stand out from the crowd with the Deluxe Upgrade content such as the unique Bassmaster® Fishing 2022 boat wrap, B.A.S.S.® branded cosmetics and equipment, and your own list of in-game Deluxe Edition challenges, so you can become the ultimate Bassmaster angler.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2Gb dedicated video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
